abstract: A museum that billed itself as a “world-class” women’s history museum in an application is about to open as a Jack the Ripper museum.

headline.main: New Women’s History Museum in London Turns Out to be a Jack the Ripper Museum
headline.print_headline: Jack the Ripper Museum Stirs Debate

snippet: A museum that billed itself as a “world-class” women’s history museum in an application is about to open as a Jack the Ripper museum.
